snippet: General Motors’ sales streak came to an end with a 1 percent decline in August, but Chrysler sales jumped 20 percent; Ford sales were flat.
abstract: General Motors' sales drop 1.2 percent in August 2014 compared with year-ago period, while Chrysler Group's total sales for the month increase 20 percent compared to 2013 and sales at Ford Motor stay essentially flat.
lead_paragraph: General Motors’ sales streak came to an end with a 1 percent decline in August, but Chrysler sales jumped 20 percent; Ford sales were flat.

headline.main: August Sales Fall for G.M. as Trucks Lift Chrysler
headline.print_headline: August Sales Fall for G.M. as Trucks Lift Chrysler
